citation: Proclamation under the Electoral Amendment Act 2019 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Electoral Amendment Act 2019

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Electoral Amendment Act 2019 â€“

        (a) fix 18 April 2019 as the day on which the provisions of that Act, other than sections 7 and 9, commence; and
        (b) fix 1 July 2019 as the day on which sections 7 and 9 of that Act commence.
17 April 2019

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 17 April 2019

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
